title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, pull, and manage models from Node or the browser.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, pull, list, delete models with a few lines of code.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package to use Ollama models as LLMs or chat models inside LangChain pipelines.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (formerly Ollama-WebUI); chat, multi-model, file upload, RAG, admin panel.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Lightweight interactive CLI wrapper around Ollama with conversation memory, syntax highlighting, and scripting hooks.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that brings local Ollama models into GitHub Copilot-style inline suggestions and chat.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; fluent builder API, streaming, embeddings, model management, Android compatible.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Official Ruby gem for Ollama; simple idiomatic interface to chat, generate, pull, and list models.

title: ollama-chatbot
summary: Streamlit chatbot template that chains Ollama + LangChain + Chroma for local RAG conversations.

title: ollama-nix
summary: Nix derivation to build and run Ollama declaratively on NixOS with GPU acceleration flags.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node selection and PVC model cache.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET 8 community SDK for Ollama; strongly typed client, dependency-injection friendly, streaming chat support.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Async Rust client for Ollama using reqwest; chat, generate, embeddings, pull, delete with Tokio streams.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack 2.x integration to use Ollama generators and chatters in deepset Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Collection of Docker Compose stacks bundling Ollama, Open-WebUI, Weaviate, qdrant, and nginx for local LLM playgrounds.

title: ollama-node
summary: Zero-dependency Node.js wrapper around the Ollama REST API with TypeScript support and async iterators.

title: ollama-py
summary: Community Python client (unofficial) offering synchronous and asynchronous wrappers for all Ollama endpoints.

title: ollama-rag-qa
summary: Lightweight RAG question-answering demo using Ollama embeddings + Chroma + Streamlit for PDF docs.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hosted Discord bot that streams Ollama model responses into any channel via slash commands.
